content:
Hello, I was just about to try out the amazing logic sheets here: https://github.com/ImperialCollegeLondon/M40001_lean/blob/master/src/2021/logic/README.md
But my local version of Lean in VSCode tells me "unknown package tactic"
Sounds like you're looking at lean 3 code with lean 4
@Kevin Buzzard Are there lean 4 versions of these sheets? Or do you maybe have some tipps on how I can use them while still using lean 4
You can't use lean 3 code in lean 4. I'll probably make lean 4 versions of the sheets in September because I'm teaching the course again in October
Markus Heimerl has marked this topic as resolved.
